Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Whole Genome Sequencing of Two 22q11DS Trios
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Whole Genome Sequencing of Two Family Trios with 22q.11.2 Deletion Syndrome
Configuration.Description: Two subjects with 22q11.2 deletion syndromes (22q11DS) and their parents were recruited for a whole genome sequencing study to identify candidate genetic modifiers of the various phenotypes seen in 22q11DS. Both probands had a typical 3 megabase deletion on chromosome 22q11.2 but discordant phenotypes.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Inclusion criteria: Probands diagnosed with 22q11.2 deletion syndrome and has 3 megabase deletion on chromosome 22q11.2 confirmed by fluorescence in situ hybridization. Both parents are available for DNA collection and are unaffected.

Exclusion criteria: Probands with alternate or atypical 22q11.2 deletions. Parents unavailable for sequencing.
